message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $150 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $165.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position. I would like to counteroffer at $150 for the product.
